archive_loader.h
1 #ifndef VISTLE_ARCHIVE_LOADER_H
2 #define VISTLE_ARCHIVE_LOADER_H
3 
4 #include "archives.h"
5 #include "assert.h"
6 #include "shmvector.h"
7 
8 #include <boost/mpl/for_each.hpp>
9 
10 namespace vistle {
11 
12 struct V_COREEXPORT ArrayLoader {
13 
14  struct BaseUnreffer {
15  virtual ~BaseUnreffer() {}
16  };
17 
18  template<typename T>
19  struct Unreffer: public BaseUnreffer {
20  Unreffer(ShmVector<T> &ref): m_ref(ref) {}
21  ShmVector<T> m_ref;
22  };
23 
24  ArrayLoader(const std::string &name, int type, const vistle::iarchive &ar): m_ok(false), m_name(name), m_type(type), m_ar(ar) {}
25  ArrayLoader() = delete;
26  ArrayLoader(const ArrayLoader &other) = delete;
27 
28  std::shared_ptr<BaseUnreffer> m_unreffer;
29 
30  template<typename T>
31  void operator()(T) {
32  if (shm_array<T, typename shm<T>::allocator>::typeId() == m_type) {
33  if (m_ok) {
34  m_ok = false;
35  std::cerr << "ArrayLoader: multiple type matches for data array " << m_name << std::endl;
36  return;
37  }
38  auto arr = Shm::the().getArrayFromName<T>(m_name);
39  if (arr) {
40  std::cerr << "ArrayLoader: already have data array with name " << m_name << std::endl;
41  m_unreffer.reset(new Unreffer<T>(arr));
42  return;
43  }
44  auto &ar = const_cast<vistle::iarchive &>(m_ar);
45  std::string name;
46  ar & name;
47  vassert(name == m_name);
48  arr = ShmVector<T>((shm_name_t)m_name);
49  arr.construct();
50  ar & *arr;
51  m_unreffer.reset(new Unreffer<T>(arr));
52  m_ok = true;
53  }
54  }
55 
56  bool load() {
57  boost::mpl::for_each<VectorTypes>(boost::reference_wrapper<ArrayLoader>(*this));
58  if (!m_ok) {
59  std::cerr << "ArrayLoader: failed to restore array " << m_name << " from archive" << std::endl;
60  }
61  return m_ok;
62  }
63 
64  bool m_ok;
65  std::string m_name;
66  int m_type;
67  const vistle::iarchive &m_ar;
68 };
69 
70 class V_COREEXPORT DeepArchiveFetcher: public Fetcher, public std::enable_shared_from_this<DeepArchiveFetcher> {
71 public:
72  DeepArchiveFetcher(std::map<std::string, std::vector<char>> &objects, std::map<std::string, std::vector<char>> &arrays);
73 
74  void requestArray(const std::string &name, int type, const std::function<void()> &completeCallback) override;
75  void requestObject(const std::string &name, const std::function<void()> &completeCallback) override;
76 
77 private:
78  std::map<std::string,std::vector<char>> m_objects;
79  std::map<std::string,std::vector<char>> m_arrays;
80 };

84 }
